```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)
library(here)
```


```{r}
#ca_np<-read_csv(here("data","ca_np.csv"))
#ci_np<-read_excel(here("data","ci_np.xlsx"))
ggbase<-ggplot(data=ci_np,aes(x = year, y=visitors))
ggbase +
  geom_line(
  color = "purple",
  linetype = "dashed"
  )
ggbase+
  geom_point(
    color="red",
    shape=19,
    alpha=0.3,
  )
ggbase+geom_col()
ggbase+geom_area()
ggbase +
  geom_point(
    aes(size = visitors,
        color = visitors),
    alpha = 0.5
  )
```
